text: Aakasham is a 2007 Indian Malayalam film, directed by AK Sundar Das, starring Harishree Ashokan in the lead roles.http://www.nowrunning.com/movie/3841/malayalam/aakasham/index.htm ==Summary== Manoharan (Harisree Asokan) is hardworking mechanic leading a happy life with his wife, kids, mother and brother in law. His greatest dream is to own a house for himself. But his life turns for the worst when the sketch of a person accused in a bomb blast shows a strange resemblance to him. Though everyone is sure that Manoharan is innocent, he himself develops a wild fear, and he absconds from his home. ==Cast== * Harisree Ashokan as Manoharan * Innocent as Varghese Abraham Pathirikkodan * KPAC Lalitha as Lakshmiyamma * Baby Nayanthara as Mayakutti * Jaffer Idukki as Sainuddin * Jyothirmayi as Bhanu * Mamukkoya as Mammalikka * Nias Bekker as Jeevan *Saikumar as DYSP Raghunananan *Anil Murali as Ramadas *Subair as IG *TP Madhavan as Subramaniyam Potti *Ambika Mohan as Kanakam *Baiju VK as Baiju *Dinesh Nair as Autorickshaw driver *Nisha Sarang as Raghunanandan's wife *Kozhikode Narayanan Nair as Bhanu's father *Bindu Panikkar as Bharathi *KTS Padannayil as Barber *Vijayan Peringodu as Koyakka *Majeed as Police officer ==References== ==External links== * Category:2007 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films Category:Films directed by Sundar Das
title: Aakasham
